rules.title: How to play
rules.rule1: Tap a cell to place a tent or mark it as empty
rules.rule2: Each tent must be adjacent to exactly one tree (up/down/left/right)
rules.rule3: Each tree is paired with exactly one tent
rules.rule4: Tents cannot touch each other, not even diagonally
rules.rule5: Numbers show how many tents must be in each row/column
